believed the company needed a more mature leader.( AP Photo/Nati Harnik) The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Page's personal ambition. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . sparked by the revolt. Zahi Hawass , minister of state for antiquities, said a statue of boy king Tutankhamun and several other ancient treasures had been stolen from the museum. The missing objects include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said. to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of December 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google stock and controlled 9.6 per cent of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000
